error.message: Parameter $twig_environment of method Drupal\google_webfonts_helper\StyleGenerator::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Twig_Environment: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Environment" instead
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
